name: Zomby Soldier
description: Dark theme shooter where player character is zombie who needs to kill other zombies and find more blood
minimum_requirements: OS: windows 8 Processor: i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 800 series DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: Direct x9
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8 Processor: i7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 960M DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: Direct x9
